SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: add the serviceDetails to the msg

MAP.COMMENT: map details from service to message and set logger

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: set a default logger if none is set

MAP.COMMENT: extract details from the last error and append to the logMsg

Values.value: Error when logging msg '%messageText%' with severity '%severity%' and logger '%logger%': %lastError/error%
